testcase.name: To validate find an account using email address when user forgets password
testcase.system-out: Given As a user must launch facebook application............................passed When As a user must click on forgot password link...........................passed Given User should enter valid email id for finding the linked account.......passed And User should click on search button......................................passed Then User must validate the message.........................................passed

testcase.name: To validate find an account using Username when user forgets password
testcase.system-out: Given As a user must launch facebook application............................passed When As a user must click on forgot password link...........................passed Given User should enter valid Username for finding the linked account.......passed And User should click on search button......................................passed Then User must validate the message.........................................passed
